markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Springing Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=1261) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don't automatically fail [Long Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.
name: Springing Leaper
